sectors.name: Footwear & Sole Manufacturing
sectors.title: Footwear & Sole Manufacturing
sectors.description: Producing leather footwear for local and international markets. Export-oriented product lines include men's, women's, and children's shoes. Strong domestic distribution network.

products.name: Men's Leather Shoes
products.description: Export-grade men's footwear for international markets
products.alt: Elegant formal leather dress shoes for men

products.name: Women's Footwear
products.description: Stylish and comfortable women's shoes for domestic and export markets
products.alt: A pair of modern casual sneakers on a clean background

products.name: Children's Footwear
products.description: Durable and comfortable children's shoes
products.alt: Colorful children's shoes in various sizes

products.name: Export-Grade Footwear
products.description: High-quality footwear for international markets
products.alt: A collection of high-quality export-grade footwear

sectors.name: Sole & Component
sectors.title: Sole & Component Manufacturing
sectors.description: Sole production (Rubber, EVA, PU) is planned for future in-house implementation but has not yet started.

products.name: Rubber Soles
products.description: Planned: High-grip, long-lasting rubber soles
products.alt: Stacks of durable rubber soles for shoes

products.name: EVA Soles
products.description: Planned: Lightweight and flexible EVA soles
products.alt: Lightweight and flexible EVA soles

products.name: Polyurethane (PU) Soles
products.description: Planned: Comfort and flexibility with PU technology
products.alt: Lightweight and flexible polyurethane (PU) soles

sectors.name: Public Bus Transport
sectors.title: Public Bus Transport Services (Soloda)
sectors.description: Operates city and intercity bus transportation services across major routes with luxury buses. Operates a growing fleet to meet demand for safe and reliable mobility.

products.name: City Bus Services
products.description: Luxury city bus transportation across major urban routes
products.alt: Modern city bus providing urban transportation

products.name: Intercity Bus Services
products.description: Comfortable intercity luxury bus transportation
products.alt: A large luxury intercity coach on a highway

sectors.name: Food Processing
sectors.title: Food Processing Division (Flour & Biscuits)
sectors.description: Wheat flour production with modern milling machinery. Biscuit manufacturing line producing assorted varieties. Ensures compliance with food safety and quality standards.

products.name: Wheat Flour
products.description: High-quality wheat flour produced with modern milling machinery
products.alt: Premium wheat flour in production

products.name: Hard Biscuits
products.description: Assorted hard biscuit varieties
products.alt: Freshly baked biscuits on a production line

products.name: Soft Biscuits
products.description: Assorted soft biscuit varieties
products.alt: Packaged biscuit products on production line

sectors.name: Bus Assembly
sectors.title: Bus Assembly Plant
sectors.description: Being developed in technical collaboration with Foton International Trade Co., Ltd. (China). Will assemble electric (EV) and diesel buses for city, intercity, and export markets. Planned capabilities include chassis assembly, body manufacturing, electrical installation, painting & finishing, and quality testing.

products.name: Electric Buses (EV)
products.description: Zero-emission electric buses for city and intercity routes
products.alt: A modern electric city bus on a city street

products.name: Diesel Buses
products.description: Diesel-powered buses for city and intercity transportation
products.alt: A large diesel inter-city coach on a highway

products.name: City Buses
products.description: Urban transit buses for city routes
products.alt: Modern city bus designed for urban transportation

products.name: Intercity Buses
products.description: Long-distance coaches for intercity routes
products.alt: A large intercity coach on a highway

products.name: Staff Buses
products.description: Customized staff transportation solutions
products.alt: Staff bus for corporate transportation

sectors.name: Textile & Apparel
sectors.title: Textile & Apparel Manufacturing
sectors.description: A modern textile and garment factory in the project development stage. Expected to produce uniforms, casual wear, and export apparel. Will support Ethiopia's textile value chain and job creation goals.

products.name: Uniforms
products.description: Professional uniforms for various industries
products.alt: Professional uniforms ready for production

products.name: Casual Wear
products.description: Stylish casual clothing for domestic and export markets
products.alt: Finished casual garments ready for export

products.name: Export Apparel
products.description: High-quality export-oriented garments
products.alt: Export-quality ready-made garments
